objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getUserLocale
objects.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_isUserLocaleEnglishUs
objects.description: Returns true if the user's locale is en_US, which is English, United States

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
objects.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList
objects.description: Casts the input to a dictionary list

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayUser
objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate
objects.description: Formats a date for read-only text display. Note, do not use this rule to format date times, only dates. Returns text.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection
objects.description: Generic query entity with query selection (So that huge load can be avoided while querying)

objects.name: AS_GAM_translateMultipleBundleKeys
objects.description: Rule to translate multiple bundle keys

objects.name: AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_GCM_QE_getRefClauseTextsWithQuerySelection
objects.description: Query selection rule - Returns ref clause text details (AS_GCM_R_Clause_Texts) based on the given filter set

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getClauseSetClauseDetails
objects.description: Returns clause set clause data along with all relationships

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefContractTypeData
objects.description: Returns a list of reference contract type

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefData
objects.description: Returns a list of reference data

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_getClauseSetClauseTextsWithQuerySelection
objects.description: Get Clause Set Clause Texts With Query Selection

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_regexsearch
objects.description: contains regexsearch() which handles the type casting issue.

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_truncateText
objects.description: Given a text and maxLenght, will only truncate the length

objects.name: AS_GCM_doesHtmlContainVisibleCharacters
objects.description: Return the Boolean to determine does the html text contains any visible characters in it

objects.name: AS_GCM_extractBalancedTagThatHasGivenText
objects.description: Returns the balanced tag with proper opening and closing tags

objects.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
objects.description: The rule returns the hex code when a color name is passed

objects.name: AS_GCM_getDisplayValueForData
objects.description: Returns the display value of the data by appending Inactive if the data is deactivated

objects.name: AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce
objects.description: This rule calls the fn!substitute in a fn!reduce to replace all the text with the given text. If no input is passed to ri!replaceWith the text will be replaced with empty string

objects.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseSetRelatedActionPlaceholder
objects.description: Placeholder screen for Clause Set and Clause Set Clauses related action while the Clause Set is in Generation state

objects.name: AS_GCM_CPS_DisplayFullRuleConditions
objects.description: Display Full Rule section in Clause Set Clause Inclusion reason
calls: AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced

objects.name: AS_GCM_CPS_clauseSetClauseInclusionReason
objects.description: Contains the clause set clause inclusion reason
calls: AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced

objects.name: AS_GCM_CRD_RuleVersionPreview_Recursion
objects.description: Displays the version of rule conditions, condition groups and all its nested content recursively down to the deepest child level in read-only format
calls: AS GCM QNM Rule Condition Group Version

objects.name: AS_GCM_DPL_GAM_COMP_richTextFieldWithTablePlugin
objects.description: Contains the richTextFieldWithTable component plugin

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_DisplayFormattedRuleConditionVersion
objects.description: Used to display formatted Rule conditions in Clause Set Clause Inclusion reason
calls: AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced
